intro: Heckeria glomerata, commonly known as the clustered heckeria, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Gesneriaceae. Heckeria glomerata thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in humid forest understories. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for indoor gardening and terrariums.
